DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect Activation Mist ( AM ) skin wrinkle appearance .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Effectiveness Activation Mist Facial Skin Wrinkles
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim study effect Activation Mist ( AM ) skin wrinkle . It contain proprietary blend mineral nutritional supplement patent `` Liquidized Infrared Negative Ion Activation Energy '' . Active ingredient include sodium bicarbonate , potassium bicarbonate , sodium carbonate , strontium carbonate , gold nanoparticles , calcium , germanium , selenium , zinc , sugar water . When applied skin , show reduce appearance wrinkle stimulation skin fibroblast produce new collagen remove age dermis cell , facilitate production fibrillin protein protect skin ultraviolet ray .
DOC.criteria: 1.Male female subject age 30 80 year age significant facial wrinkle assess study physician . 1 . Women pregnant lactating . 2 . Subjects skin condition deem investigator interfere result study , include limited : uncontrolled acne , rosacea , atopic dermatitis . 3 . Subjects clinically significant cardiovascular , neurological , renal , endocrine hematological abnormality uncontrolled current therapy . 4 . Subjects history skin malignancy 5 . Subjects sign recent sunburn 6 . Use following medication , within 1 week specify visit 1 1 . Systemic steroid 2 . Topical steroid use face 3 . Topical facial preparation include limited : salicylic acid acne product , tacrolimus , pimecrolimus .
